fullName: Test the Batch using GET: Test if user is able to get all batches when sending invalid endpoint

labels.name: story
labels.value: Test if user is able to get all batches when sending invalid endpoint

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Test if user is able to get all batches when sending invalid endpoint

name: Test if user is able to get all batches when sending invalid endpoint

steps.name: Given  The user sends base url as a part of request to get all batches
Then  The content type of response header should be application/json to get all batches
When  User sends request with invalid endpoint for all batches
Then  User should receive response with Not found status code for all batches
And  The response body should contain error message from "11" "API" for all batches with invalid endpoint
And  The status line should be HTTP/1.1 404 for all batches with invalid endpoint
